scripts.init:website: cd site/website && npm run init && cd ../
scripts.build:website: cd site/website && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build:website:web: cd site/website && npm run build:web && cd ../
scripts.build:website:service: cd site/website && npm run build:server && cd ../
scripts.dev:website:web: cd site/website && npm run dev:web && cd ../
scripts.dev:website:service: cd site/website && npm run dev:server && cd ../
scripts.start:website:service: cd site/website && npm run start:server && cd ../
scripts.init:z-logger: cd golang/z-logger && go mod download && go mod tidy && cd ../../
scripts.init:z-go-wechat-robot: cd golang/z-wechat-robot && go mod download && go mod tidy && cd ../../
scripts.init:z-go-demo-server:service: cd golang/z-demo-server && go mod download && go mod tidy && cd ../../
scripts.build:z-go-demo-server:service: cd golang/z-demo-server && go build -ldflags="-X main.version=1.0.0" -o demo-service.exe -a main.go && cd ../../
scripts.init:z-go-collect-server:service: cd golang/z-collect-server && go mod download && go mod tidy && cd ../../
scripts.build:z-go-collect-server:service: cd golang/z-collect-server && go build -ldflags="-X main.version=1.0.0" -o collect-service.exe -a main.go && cd ../../
scripts.init:z-go-wechat-robot-server:service: cd golang/z-wechat-robot-server && go mod download && go mod tidy && cd ../../
scripts.build:z-go-wechat-robot-server:service: cd golang/z-wechat-robot-server && go build -ldflags="-X main.version=1.0.0" -o wechat-robot-service.exe -a main.go && cd ../../
scripts.init:z-go-qq-robot-server:service: cd golang/z-qq-robot-server && go mod download && go mod tidy && cd ../../
scripts.build:z-go-qq-robot-server:service: cd golang/z-qq-robot-server && go build -ldflags="-X main.version=1.0.0" -o qq-robot-service.exe -a main.go && cd ../../
scripts.init:z-node-wechat-robot: cd node/z-wechat-robot && npm run init && cd ../../
scripts.compile:z-node-wechat-robot: cd node/z-wechat-robot && npm run compile && cd ../../
scripts.init:z-node-wechat-robot-server: cd node/z-wechat-robot-server && npm run init && cd ../../
scripts.build:z-node-wechat-robot-server: cd node/z-wechat-robot-server && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.dev:z-node-wechat-robot-server: cd node/z-wechat-robot-server && npm run dev && cd ../../
scripts.start:z-node-wechat-robot-server: cd node/z-wechat-robot-server && npm run start && cd ../../
scripts.init:gin-template: npm run init:gin-template:web:default && npm run init:gin-template:service
scripts.init:gin-template:service: cd golang/gin-template && go mod download && go mod tidy && cd ../../
scripts.build:gin-template: npm run build:gin-template:web:default && npm run build:gin-template:service
scripts.build:gin-template:web:default: cd golang/gin-template/web/default && npm run build && cd ../../../../
scripts.build:gin-template:service: cd golang/gin-template && go build -ldflags="-X main.version=1.0.0" -o template-service.exe -a main.go && cd ../../
scripts.start:gin-template:web:default: cd golang/gin-template/web/default && npm run start && cd ../../../../
scripts.init:gin-ai: npm run init:gin-ai:web:default && npm run init:gin-ai:web:berry && npm run init:gin-ai:service
scripts.init:gin-ai:service: cd golang/gin-ai-server && go mod download && go mod tidy && cd ../../
scripts.build:gin-ai: npm run build:gin-ai:web:default && npm run build:gin-ai:web:berry && npm run build:gin-ai:service
scripts.build:gin-ai:web:default: cd golang/gin-ai-server/web/default && npm run build && cd ../../../../
scripts.build:gin-ai:web:berry: cd golang/gin-ai-server/web/berry && npm run build && cd ../../../../
scripts.build:gin-ai:service: cd golang/gin-ai-server && go build -ldflags="-X main.version=1.0.0" -o ai-service.exe -a main.go && cd ../../
scripts.start:gin-ai:web:default: cd golang/gin-ai-server/web/default && npm run start && cd ../../../../
scripts.start:gin-ai:web:berry: cd golang/gin-ai-server/web/berry && npm run start && cd ../../../../
scripts.init:gin-wechat: npm run init:gin-wechat:web:default && npm run init:gin-wechat:service
scripts.init:gin-wechat:service: cd golang/gin-wechat-server && go mod download && go mod tidy && cd ../../
scripts.build:gin-wechat: npm run build:gin-wechat:web:default && npm run build:gin-wechat:service
scripts.build:gin-wechat:web:default: cd golang/gin-wechat-server/web/default && npm run build && cd ../../../../
scripts.build:gin-wechat:service: cd golang/gin-wechat-server && go build -ldflags="-X main.version=1.0.0" -o wechat-service.exe -a main.go && cd ../../
scripts.start:gin-wechat:web:default: cd golang/gin-wechat-server/web/default && npm run start && cd ../../../../
scripts.init:gin-message: npm run init:gin-message:web:default && npm run init:gin-message:service
scripts.init:gin-message:service: cd golang/gin-message-server && go mod download && go mod tidy && cd ../../
scripts.build:gin-message: npm run build:gin-message:web:default && npm run build:gin-message:service
scripts.build:gin-message:web:default: cd golang/gin-message-server/web/default && npm run build && cd ../../../../
scripts.build:gin-message:service: cd golang/gin-message-server && go build -ldflags="-X main.version=1.0.0" -o message-service.exe -a main.go && cd ../../
scripts.start:gin-message:web:default: cd golang/gin-message-server/web/default && npm run start && cd ../../../../
scripts.init:gin-file: npm run init:gin-file:web:default && npm run init:gin-file:service
scripts.init:gin-file:service: cd golang/gin-file-server && go mod download && go mod tidy && cd ../../
scripts.build:gin-file: npm run build:gin-file:web:default && npm run build:gin-file:service
scripts.build:gin-file:web:default: cd golang/gin-file-server/web/default && npm run build && cd ../../../../
scripts.build:gin-file:service: cd golang/gin-file-server && go build -ldflags="-X main.version=1.0.0" -o file-service.exe -a main.go && cd ../../
scripts.start:gin-file:web:default: cd golang/gin-file-server/web/default && npm run start && cd ../../../../
scripts.init:z-chat-room: cd golang/z-chat-room && go mod download && go mod tidy && cd ../../
scripts.build:z-chat-room: npm run build:z-chat-room-windows && npm run build:z-chat-room-macos
scripts.build:z-chat-room-windows: cd golang/z-chat-room && go build -ldflags="-X main.version=1.0.0" -o chat-room-service.exe -a main.go && cd ../../
scripts.build:z-chat-room-macos: cd golang/z-chat-room && set GOOS=darwin && set GOARCH=amd64 && go build -ldflags="-X main.version=1.0.0" -o chat-room-service -a main.go && cd ../../
scripts.init:z-node-chat-room: cd node/z-chat-room && npm run init && cd ../../
scripts.compile:z-node-chat-room: cd node/z-chat-room && npm run compile && cd ../../
scripts.build:z-node-chat-room: cd node/z-chat-room && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.dev:z-node-chat-room: cd node/z-chat-room && npm run dev && cd ../../
scripts.start:z-node-chat-room: cd node/z-chat-room && npm run start && cd ../../
